preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 1
preparationSteps.mainStep: Gather ingredients and prepare the chicken:
bullets: In a small bowl, mix 1 Tablespoon of oil with 1 teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper
Cut each chicken thigh (1 ½ pounds in total)  into 2 equal-size pieces
In a small bowl, mix 1 tablespoon oil with 1 teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper
Rub mixture all over chicken pieces
Measure 2 Tablespoons of oil

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 2
preparationSteps.mainStep: Prepare ingredients for aromatics, add to a small bowl, they will be added together
bullets: Mince 2 Tablespoons fresh ginger
Mince 4 garlic cloves
1 Tablespoon of oil

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 3
bullets: Rinse 1½ cups short-grain white rice until water runs clear, drain well

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 4
preparationSteps.mainStep: Gather and prepare ingredients for the broth, they will be added together
bullets: 1¾ cups low-sodium chicken broth
Open 1 (13.5-ounce) can full-fat coconut milk
In a medium bowl, add
Core, seed and chop 1 yellow bell pepper into ½-inch pieces
Coarsely chop ½ cup of roasted cashews
Thinly slice 3 scallions (green and white parts)
1 teaspoon salt
¼ teaspoon pepper

preparationSteps.title: Prep Step 5
preparationSteps.mainStep: Gather and prepare the serving ingredients
bullets: Corsely chop 2 Tablespoons of cilantro
Hot sauce for serving

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 2
cookingSteps.mainStep: Heat large Dutch oven over medium heat
bullets: Add and heat 2 Tablespoons oil (2 minutes)
Working in two batches, brown chicken turing halfway (5 minutes)
Transfer browned chicken to a plate

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 3
bullets: Add the small bowl with the 2 Tablespoons of ginger, 4 garlic cloves minced, and Tablespoon oil to empty pot, stir
Add rice and stir until evenly coated in oil
Add the 1¾ cups chicken broth, 1 can of coconut milk,and the medium bowl with the 1 bell pepper, ½ of cashews, 3 scallions, 1 teaspoon salt and ¼ teaspoon pepper
Stir to lift up any browned bits from bottom of pot

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 4
bullets: Arrange chicken pieces on top of rice mixture
Add any accumulated juices from the chicken plate
Bring to a boil over high heat

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 5
cookingSteps.mainStep: Cover Dutch oven with lid and transfer to preheated 375°F oven
bullets: Bake rice until liquid is absorbed, rice is tender and chicken is cooked through (25 minutes)

cookingSteps.title: Cooking Step 6
bullets: Remove from oven
Scatter chopped cilantro over the chicken and rice
Divide among bowls and serve with hot sauce
